body_html: OK, I can reproduce the hang (I was mistakenly running with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES= which makes it pass). This suggests that with tf.device("/cpu:0") tries to place some parts of the computation on GPU which causes the hang

body: OK, I can reproduce the hang (I was mistakenly running with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES= which makes it pass). This suggests that `with tf.device("/cpu:0")` tries to place some parts of the computation on GPU which causes the hang
